text: Oklahoma Terror is a 1939 American film directed by Spencer Gordon Bennet. == Cast == *Addison Randall as Jack Ridgely *Al St. John as "Fuzzy" Glass *Virginia Carroll as Helen Martin *Don Rowan as Slade *Davison Clark as Cartwright *Glenn Strange as Ross Haddon *Tristram Coffin as Mason *Warren McCollum as Don Martin *Ralph Peters as Reb Nelson *Nolan Willis as Henchman Yucca Woodridge *Rusty as Rusty, Jack's Horse == External links == * * Category:1939 films Category:American films Category:1930s Western (genre) films Category:Romantic Western (genre) films Category:1930s action films Category:1930s adventure films Category:English-language films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Monogram Pictures films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:American adventure films
title: Oklahoma Terror
